short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabPilotX gives you quick access to your favorite websites with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a new way of browsing with TabPilotX, the Chrome extension that helps you reach your favorite websites faster and easier. Whether you need frequently used tools, entertainment platforms or social networks, TabPilotX puts them all just a click away.

Features
- Quick Access: Open pinned tabs with just one click.

- Automatic Tab Jumping: Automatically detect and switch to pinned tabs that are already open.

- Organized List: Manage pinned tabs in a customizable list with drag-and-drop functionality.

- Flexible Moving and Deleting: Easily move or delete tabs to customize your list.

- Dark Mode: Use the dark mode for a more comfortable browsing experience.

Advantages
- Time Efficiency: Save time by accessing your most important tabs quickly and easily.
- Productivity: Stay organized and avoid the clutter of multiple open tabs.
- Ease of use: Easy to use with intuitive features that improve your browsing experience.

Install TabPilotX now and experience a new dimension of tab management!
